title: Hidden Treasures: Switched
description: Even though Patricia Coben was teased and made fun of for the way she looked, she was still a happy girl. That is, until a cruel prank was played on her that made her the laughingstock of the entire school. Her life became miserable until she found a store that claimed to have all of the answers. With the help of a new magic shop, she manages to change her identity by switching bodies with the most popular girl in school. And her classmates will regret having messed with her, because when you're pretty, you can get away with murder.
author: Shiloh Sanders
